data.text: @charlesjaco1 Their yard signs line Geyer between S. Geyer & Ballas

@charlesjaco1 Charles, do you have any evidence of these candidate's positions? None of their exact poistions seem to be mentioned anywhere online and their being backed by an institution does not necessarily mean they are one and the same.
@charlesjaco1 @IRS_CI should Churches be making political endorsements?
@charlesjaco1 Because “standing against rw conspiracy theories” and “focus on teachers” has somehow become a bad thing to conservatives 😅
